title: Shadowed Lands
goal: The group travels through increasingly corrupted territory, witnessing the Blight's devastation firsthand.

beats.summary: The newly formed trio journeys through a region increasingly affected by the Blight, witnessing its devastating effects on flora, fauna, and isolated settlements.
They encounter survivors or refugees who share harrowing tales of the Blight's insidious spread and the fear it instills.
Kaelen's memories become clearer as he recognizes patterns of corruption reminiscent of his past, making him realize the Blight's ancient methods.
